name: Pocket Guild Game
description:
Recruit members, take down bosses, and lead your guild to glory!
New mastery patch features:
- Mastery tree + Activated abilities
- Members able to gain stats through dungeons
- Basic sorting + class icons next to names
- Send members to do quests
- 4 new dungeons
- Decoration Shop
- More music, sound effects
- Small things such as UI tweaks, improved tutorial etc.

Base Features:
- Choose your character
- Create / manage your guild members
- Obtain legendary characters
- Over 260 unique hand crafted characters!
- Plan/run through unique dungeons
- Angry hand crafted bosses
- Loot (Simple gear score), ninjas, guild drama.. and more!

Check out more at: www.pocketguildgame.com!
